segments.text: I need to get a taxi .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a variety of transportation services . Would you prefer a private vehicle to a taxi ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that won't be necessary . I just need a taxi .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you'd prefer a limousine . That's such a stylish way to travel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What time do you want to depart from the hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to leave as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , a taxi will arrive in seconds , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , I'm coming down now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It won't be but a few seconds , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
